originalText.text: Tickets are dirt cheap and easy on your wallet. Buses are clean and well maintained the driver's are friendly, helpful and respectful. You get no complaints from me. I will say this, my driver this time around had a leadfoot, seems like he was trying to out race the cars and trucks on the highway. He needs psychiatric help. We all got to NYC in one piece. Aside from that all was well.

originalText.text: This unscrupulous company claims to offer luxury bus travel with wifi, power outlets and modern busses with comfortable seats and a bathroom. Instead they send an airport shuttle that was not safe for highway travel with none of these amenities. Furthermore, the driver shows up 30 minutes late, is totally confused and has no idea where we are going. I had this exact same experience with this company a couple weeks ago on this airport shuttle and it inflammed my back injury severely because this airport shuttle is extremely uncomfortable and has no suspension. I have tried to contact this company about this and theyvare completely unsympathetic.  They claimed it was a one off experience and now today the exact same thing. I have tried to contact them again today and there is no way to reach them. Only automated bus status options are available via their phone line. This company must be reported to BBB and DOT.

originalText.text: Excellent rides! Clean modern buses, easy use helpful App, convenient schedule

text.text: Excellent rides! Clean modern buses, easy use helpful App, convenient schedule

originalText.text: I booked a ticket from New York City to Philadelphia and back (the journey took place on the 01 july 2023). The bus departed and arrived on time both times. The only negative point is that I didn't find a wifi network in the bus. The driver drived well & the bus was comfortable. The price was only 30$ for the hole trip.

The only negative point is that I didn't find a wifi network in the bus. The driver drived well & the bus was comfortable. The price was only 30$ for the hole trip.

originalText.text: Excellent service! Bus driver Regina was AWESOME and complimentary water was much appreciated. Left on time both times, and really friendly staff. Best NYC-Boston bus experience I’ve ever had!
